comments.body:
@cmutel -- are you ok being added as a co-maintainer of the bw2speedups recipe on conda-forge?

https://conda-forge.org/docs/recipe.html#maintainer-role

Also, any thoughts on providing the `license_file` for this package? It could be included here via:
https://conda-forge.org/docs/meta.html#packaging-the-license-manually

if you don't want to push a new release.

@cardosan I released 2.2.1 with the license file included (filename LICENSE). 

@synapticarbors Thanks a lot for your help! Yes, I am OK being added as a co-maintainer.
